advancements.azukaarsfairdifficultyoverh: Those creeper have lived a long life. Holding in their explosion for so long had the pain disfigure their face and crack their skins.
Unlike their naturally spreading counterparts, these are raised artificially with ill intent, explaining their behavior. Someone once said they heard one of them whisper 'help me'.
A bestiary of the mod, with some lore.
